title: Kara3
author: Kara3
content: My country people I dy greet oo, Good evening inside this evening,I want tlk about one serious issue wey dy bring us backward for our country wey be na my brother na my brother, oyibo man call am tribalism.True true for this country we dy go back because we we know people we dy capable to do most of the jobs for we country, but base on say him no from my place, we no go give am the job, we go come give less qualify person we go do nonsense wrk, or person wey no know anything about the job base on say na ur brother.AmMake we take our presidency as example now, during election time in 2015, we know say buhari na less qualify candidate, but because we dy do brother brother, we vote am in, him come later dy show us shege.Early this year, we know say jagabam na less qualify candidate due to health reason and intellectual capacity, but because of tribalism, na south South turn, we still put am for power, now him dy show us snr level of shege.All this na north turn, na South turn, e don tire me, we sopos dy more concern about who go fit do the work well, no be brother brother tins.After all this man no man tins, wen tins do go ugly, we go start to dy cry as if to say we do the right thing we go cry.My country people how ona see this wahala we dy inside so?

comments.author: Charles-Tim
comments.body: Quote from: Kara3 on October 09, 2023, 07:21:32 PMEarly this year, we know say jagabam na less qualify candidate due to health reason and intellectual capacity, but because of tribalism, na south South turn, we still put am for power, now him dy show us snr level of shege.The three presidential candidates which are Tinubu (the incumbent president), Atiku which is the second and Peter Obi which is the third that has the highest vote, are all not from South South. I think you are referring to Peter Obi which is from Anambra state. Anambra are Igbos and Igbos are South East, while some of themselves are referring to it as East.I have posted before that the problem of Nigeria is beyond tribalism. I prefer regional government, but even if there is regional government, there is nothing that can end tribalism. But tribalism is not the cause of what is happening in most Africa countries, there is something that our leaders are not getting rightly. Also that tribalism has nothing to do with corruption and mismanagement.

comments.author: Egii Nna
comments.created_time: October 09, 2023, 10:51:08 PMLast edit: October 09, 2023, 11:14:33 PM by Egii Nna
comments.body: You are talking about tribalism more than you ever thought of it because if you know what tribalism has done in Nigeria so far, you go cry tyre. Did you know that tribalism is one of the main causes of poverty in Nigeria? Tribalism is the main source of corruption, selfishness, self-interest, and many more things that have destroyed the hearts of all Nigerians. I can’t say half or some percent, but all Nigerians, no, no, no, you must have a bit of tribalism in your mind, and the main cause of it, I think, is the too many tribes that we have living in Nigeria.Quote from: Kara3 on October 09, 2023, 07:21:32 PMTrue true for this country we dy go back because we we know people we dy capable to do most of the jobs for we country, but base on say him no from my place, we no go give am the job, we go come give less qualify person we go do nonsense wrk, or person wey no know anything about the job base on say na ur brother.AmThis has caused a lot of unemployment in Nigeria. Many graduates out there without jobs are mostly affected by tribalism. I had a friend back then when I was studying for my diploma course. This friend of mine told me that after we graduate, there is already a well-paid job waiting for him. I asked him, "How comes when you have not achieved your certificate? He said to me that his father friend is the MD (managing director) of the organisation. The worst part of it is that someone who studied health courses getting a job in a construction organisation is so sad. Though Nigeria has tribalism in their blood, all we can say is, My God, deliver us all in this country.

comments.author: MainIbem
comments.body: If no be anything me for say make dem share the president position among the 3 ethnic groups so that peace go reign for we country make every body manage their ends because if not case and issues go still dey ground. To reduce this much statement and argument on whom we go vote or go fit deliver us e beta say them people select their representative so that them no go say them do tribalism or putting incompetent person for seat to go rule people. If say BAT na only Yoruba him dey represent e for better pass the whole country, while we allow Hausa bring their candidate and as well Igbos bring their candidate like this every body for hustle to make their people get more opportunities by bringing much competition between the 3 representatives.

Na corruption and bribery nigerian politicians dey use enter seat. Just like wetin you talk, people dey wey vote for Buhari ohh but no say na everybody vote for buhari or president Tinubu.Secondly I never see any better person wey go fit rule naija well, all this peter obi and Atiku we dey talk about nothing come out.And lastly you dey talk about north turn, south turn. Make I choke you na still the south people na no want power to come south, for example make we see wetin happen to Wike na still south governors betray am carry the flag barrier give Atiku.So for now naija never ready for a better Nigeria

comments.author: Hewlet
comments.body: Quote from: Kara3 on October 09, 2023, 07:21:32 PMAll this na north turn, na South turn, e don tire me, we sopos dy more concern about who go fit do the work well, no be brother brother things For me oh, because the structure of our country comprises different ethnic groups and different regions, I think it will be very difficult to elect a leader at the federal level without putting factors like, what part the person comes from and do the normal zoning to either the north, south, east, west or what have you.Of course, competence should be very paramount when electing a leader but if after zoning the presidency to a particular region, the competent ones in that region can now come out to contest for such political position.I think what had always played out in our election is more of party / personal interest than any ethnic sentiment. A situation where we allow just selected parties and individual to recycle themselves in our political system is a strong indication that we are not ready for any change anytime soon.Another serious issue of concern about our fellow Nigerian is how they get carried away with small peanut that comes during election and will vote anyone that is willing to pay them small cash on the day of the election.I was at akwa ibom in the just concluded election and in my compound my neighbours were bragging about how they won't vote a particular candidate for reasons best known to them, when the day of election came, the same party offered to give them just 4k and they shamelessly gave out there vote. Later they will still be the ones to talk about bad leaders.

comments.author: HajiBagi
comments.body: Your Matta get point my brother, but if you take look at this our country now even if you vote for the person wey be your tribe, if the person wan fuck up him go fuck up, no any candidate wey go commot for naija now tell me say no be money him find go politics, nobody go play with the opportunity of being in a position of making money, even as I dey like this, if I get even small opportunity enter president sit I swear I no go loseguard, I most make sure say I make enough money before I commot for that sit, I Don change my mind say I no fit blame anybody wey dey presidential sit because him no waiting him dey feel sometimes, them too wey dey that sit dey suffer because if they reach the office, they will see some dept wey be say person wey leave keep for am, and the dept no be small money E dey be. The reason why things for our country Don dey tired me is because no matter how we take explain, we go explain evidence no go dey , and if evidence dey my brother we no fit do anything because if you want fight with government na you go still lose, talking about north and south people say them no do good no mean say candidate no fit commot for there to find president sit again, person go commot and them go still vote for am, we Nigerians don't know anything pass money, if we see money our body go dey shake and we no fit control am say we no go collect the money, the only thing wey I want you to understand is that, even if igbo, hausa, or yoruba enter president sit na waiting go sup for naija go still sup, so he go better make we keep our mind reason something good.

comments.author: Usasauki2004
comments.body: Tribalism wey you talk no bad but as e be no matter what if you see your person you no go leave am vote another person wey no be your own (for 9ja Dy take tribalism as must do o). Politics wey you see ehh for 9ja na rotational and e be like turn by turn. If wuna go recall, our current president tinubu talk am say EMI lokan meaning it's my turn and nobody for this country fit go against him ah just they wonder for having that liver ooo. People wey talk say tinubu no well, Omo the man healthy and ah just see am say na political tactics again so daht people go assume say make we vote am even if he win e no go tey for sit. Just take a look at how things turn now, I just Dy feel say e go rule for four years and still go for another four years and e go hard wey e no go win. All these people wey Dy government na the same thing them be (corrupt government officials), ah no trust any of them again. Just pray make our country better again.

comments.author: Marykeller
comments.body: I no go talk sae this last election wey we do for the country, na on tribalism mostly. We Nigerians as a whole no vote on that. The Igbos, Yorubas Hausas came out massively to vote for the right candidate wey dem get at heart to power, irrespective of the tribe or religion but base on sae how corruptible our system of government d towards all sector, INEC were able to maneuver the presidential results. To declare the highest bidder for money to be our presido. Not minding whether na our choice candidate or not. They succeed in that by telling the whole Nigerians to go to court if them no like the result wey d call so as they declare Tinubu as the president of the Federal Republic of Nigeria.

comments.author: CryptoHeadlineNews
comments.body: Quote from: Kara3 on October 09, 2023, 07:21:32 PM.After all this man no man tins, wen tins do go ugly, we go start to dy cry as if to say we do the right thing we go cry.My country people how ona see this wahala we dy inside so?When we talk about tribalism, this na one menace wey don eat deep into the fibre of all the sectors for this nation, both public or private sectors, which can only take deliberate collective efforts for this to be brought to the least minimum, because this thing called tribalism, no be today eh start, as eh dey for church, eh dey for school, and eh even for community. So until people change their mindset from giving a work or position to someone worthy of such title and not someone from their tribe, the menace tribalism will never stop.However, when it comes to our country's election, it's always been a product of God-fatherism, which until you are the preferred choice of the top cabals, whichever election you do, you do in vain.

comments.author: Smilevictorobinna
comments.body: Tribalism is not the cause of our problems in Nigeria, in the last election The People's choice was peter obi be it Igbo,Hausa and Yoruba and they all voted for him but the political gladiator's in Nigeria changed the result in other to favour the candidate they wanted.Nigeria is out growing the word called tribalism gradually and that is why you could see tinubu Lossing in his own state Lagos in the last election.Nigeria's problem is greed, always wanting to benefit everything.
